column1: This is a list of most populous municipalities in Belgium. Out of the 581 Belgian municipalities (as of 1st of january 2019) the list contains all those with a population over 30
A Belgian municipality may or may not have an additional
column2: Royally-decreed city status in Belgium. Brussels
column4: is a singular urban unit consisting of 19 municipalities
